[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1622233319667{padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”custom-header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1613163566901{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;}”]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1623446304748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1619025294082{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”gradient-dk-green-lt-green-ss-icon-lt-overlay”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

9 Non-Negotiables to Grow your Business

Learn key strategies to drive new growth for your agency and clients, with tips from Jay Baer and Ann Handley.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Developed from Jay Baer and Ann Handley’s session “The 9 Non-Negotiables to Grow Your Business in 2021,” this guide features expert advice Jay and Ann gave SharpSpring’s Accelerate My Agency contest winner, Evolve Systems.

Evolve Systems’ co-founder Marnie Ochs-Raleigh spent hours with Jay and Ann, and now you can reap the rewards. We’ll take a deep dive into the pain points agencies face, and cover steps to make sure you’re not neglecting your own agency while focusing on client needs.

You may not have won the Accelerate my Agency contest, but you can still win with these actionable tips![/vc_column_text]

[vc_row][vc_column]

Ann Handley

Chief Content Officer, MarketingProfs

Ann Handley is a Wall Street Journal bestselling author who speaks worldwide about how businesses can escape marketing mediocrity to ignite tangible results. IBM named her one of the 7 people shaping modern marketing. She is the Chief Content Officer of MarketingProfs; a LinkedIn Influencer; a keynote speaker, mom, dog person, and writer.

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column]

Jay Baer

Founder, Convince & Convert

Jay is a hype-free digital marketing and customer service strategist, speaker, New York Times best-selling author of six books, and a technology investor. He founded Convince & Convert in 2008, and it is his fifth multi-million dollar venture. Jay’s Social Pros show was named Best Marketing Podcast in the Content Marketing Awards. He’s also the most retweeted person in the world among digital marketers, and one of the top 3 most influential people online among CMOs and B2B Marketers. At Convince & Convert, he oversees big picture strategy while educating and informing businesspeople on stage and on the page.read more...

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

Trusted by more than 2,000 agencies

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”209119″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625777412448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1619033134154{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]

Send it to me
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Don’t neglect your agency’s own growth. We’ve gathered all the best advice Jay Baer and Ann Handley shared with SharpSpring’s Accelerate My Agency contest winner.
